author: rhuijben
msg: In an attempt to hopefully fix the swig build on our buildbots, move
some svnpatch helpers out of svn_wc.h into a private header.
Temporarily move these functions here, waiting for further
Remove these functions from our public wc header. They

author: mf
msg: Add support for relative incremental dumps.

author: gstein
msg: read_entries() sometimes needs to distinguish between reading a subdir
entry via the parent access baton and via the subdir's access baton. When
performing a checkout, the subdir might have a new database while the
parent says the subdir is DELETED.
If a subdir is being read via the parent, yet the parent says the subdir
is not-present, then override any information discovered and return a
(enum statement_keys, statements[]): add a new query to look for
(read_entries): for subdirs, see if this directory's wc.db has a
not-present entry for it. convert to DELETED, as appropriate.

author: gstein
msg: Filter out lines that start with DBG: from output used to build trees or
used as stdout comparison. This allows code to generate debug output
(...): whitespace fixes. remove some spurious parens in "if" statements.
